name: aaronbassett-marketplace
description: Personal marketplace for Claude Code plugins, agents, and skills

plugins.name: flutter-core
plugins.description: Comprehensive Flutter and Dart development toolkit providing expert guidance on UI/UX, architecture, state management, testing, performance, deployment, and backend integration with ServerPod

plugins.name: frontend-vibes
plugins.description: Frontend UI design skill for creating developer tools with a Claude vibe

plugins.name: gh-cli
plugins.description: Comprehensive GitHub CLI (gh) integration skill enabling Claude to autonomously create and execute GitHub workflows for PRs, issues, Actions, and API operations

plugins.name: useful-commits
plugins.description: Craft concise, conventional commit messages following Conventional Commits with Angular convention

plugins.name: settings-presets
plugins.description: Configuration toolkit for streamlining Claude Code project setup with powerline status line and attribution settings
